document_data.name: Waxflower
document_data.location: [[Waterdeep/City of the Dead|City of the Dead]]
document_data.Description: Some waxflowers were speckled, some had bilobate leaves, and some expressed both of these traits.
document_data.Habitats: In the city of [[Waterdeep]], speckled waxflowers commonly grew around graves in the [[Waterdeep/City of the Dead|City of the Dead]].
